title: Women's Peplum Bodycon Long Sleeve Wear to Work Dresses Bow Party Club Ruffle Formal Cocktail Pencil Dress
description: FABRICS: Fall/Winter Work Wear Dresses Made of Spandex and Polyester, Very comfy and Stretchy Material, Super Soft, Breathable and Fashionable, Quality Guarantee and the perfect length.

FEATURES: Back zipper closure, little stretchy, peplum dress, side ruffle, Turtle Neck, Slim Fit, Knee Length, Midi Dress, Short Sleeve, This dress is absolutely amazing and it fits your curves perfectly.
OCCASIONS: fashion bow, peplum design perfect for evening, party, prom, join wedding, business and most of formal occasion.
Bodycon Bow Club Ruffle Pencil Formal Cocktail Dress Elegant Chic and Semi Formal Style, Super Flattering, Classic Enough for Outside.
SIZE: S=USA 4-6; M=8-10; L=12-14; XL=16-18; XXL=20-22; XXL=22-24. Hand Wash Recommended With Cold Water/ DON'T Bleach/ Hang Or Line Dry.
